mutants.code:
def merge_and_sort(s1, s2):
    s = s1 - s2
    s = ''.join([i for i in s if i.isalpha()])
    s = ''.join(sorted(set(s.lower())))
    return s

def merge_and_sort(s1, s2):
    s = s1 * s2
    s = ''.join([i for i in s if i.isalpha()])
    s = ''.join(sorted(set(s.lower())))
    return s
